channel.title: How to make a good SMF/phpBB2 Forum
channel.description:
[size=30pt]Post if you read!!![/size] [size=30pt]If you dont i will remove!!![/size] [b]Step 1:[/b] Make an account here: [url=http://www.freehostingnow.com]www.freehostingnow.com[/url](because it has 10,000 MG space) Remember to provide a valid Email [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/6444/pic1wn6.png[/img] [b]Step 2:[/b]Go onto your email adress and use the Confirmation URL.
[b]Step 3:[/b]Now fill in all those blank lines [img]http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/1857/pic2bn0.png[/img] [b]Step 4:[/b]Now lets start to make the Forum
[b]Step 5a:[/b]Go to MySQL manager and make a new Database and a database Account
[b]Step 5b:[/b]Go to File manager and make a new Directory and name it forum.
[b]Step 6:[/b]Click on applications and in Target directory type [b]/forum[/b] then scroll down and select SMF or phpBB2 [img]http://img50.imageshack.us/img50/9409/pic3rn4png[/img] [b]Step 7:[/b]Now fill all the Lines (if your going to use phpBB2 you have to manually delete the install files)
[b]Step 8:[/b]Enjoy your forum (if it works)
[b]Extra:[/b]If you want try the applications
[s] [/s] [center]Upgrading SMF[/center] [b]Now you want to be upgraded to the latest version right?[/b]
[b]Step 1:[/b]Download the SMF large upgrade. [url=http://www.simplemachines.org/download/index.php?thanks;filename=smf_1-1-2_install.zip]Click Here[/url]
[b]Step 2:[/b]Upload it into the same directory you put all the SMF folders into.
[b]Step 3:[/b]Extract all its contents in that directory.
[b]Step 4:[/b]Now run upgrade.php.

Step 2:Go onto your email adress and use the Confirmation URL.

Step 5a:Go to MySQL manager and make a new Database and a database Account

Step 5b:Go to File manager and make a new Directory and name it forum.

Step 6:Click on applications and in Target directory type /forum
then scroll down and select SMF or phpBB2

Step 7:Now fill all the Lines

Step 8:Enjoy your forum (if it works)
